roleset.name: make less, lessening
roleset.note: REDUCE-V NOTES: VN classes limit-76, subjugate-42.3. (from reduce.01-v)
REDUCTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on reduce-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls limit-76, subjugate-42.3. (from reduction.01-n)
REDUCED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from reduced.01-j)

role.descr: End point, end state of arg1

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: The company will reduce employment to less than 16,000 from about 18,000.

example.name: with extent
example.text: Claims from Hurricane Hugo reduced results $40 million.

example.name: end point as infinitive
example.text: Senior members are reduced to raising doomed parliamentary obstacles.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: a 24 % reduction in its work force over the next two months

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Mr. Dillow said he believes that a reduction in raw material stockbuilding by industry could lead to a sharp drop in imports .

example.name: args 2 and 3
example.text: That could pose a problem trying to meet a 10 percent reduction from last winter's average water usage.
example.arg: from last winter's average water usage

example.name: args 1 and 4
example.text: It may be that we have not explained by this method everything connected with vital phenomena, since their reduction to physical laws is as yet incomplete:
